name: CustomBullet
description:
''Custom Bullet" is an action game in which players customize a high-speed machine called a "grit slider" and "left and right weapons" to fight 1 vs. 1.
Go hot in a classical split screen match!

Exhilarating robot action.


Using jumps and boost dashes, move freely around the field
Dodge their attacks, run across the vast stage, and win!

High flexibility in customization.


Weapons are customizable by attaching custom items, such as bullet speed, power, size, firing method, and whether or not they explode.
Depending on the combination, it could create a monster.
MAKE YOUR OWN MOST POWERFUL WEAPON!
